original_title: Two AG Dept officials file complaint against political vlogger Dharshana Handungoda
original_body_lines: Two officials of the Attorney General’s Department have sought an investigation into a controversial statement made by social media activist and political vlogger Dharshana Handungoda with regard to the MV X-Press Pearl maritime disaster mentioning their names.
Accordingly, a complaint has been filed with the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).
